titles.ar: بَابُ أَنَّ الْمُحْرِمَ لَا يَرْتَمِسُ فِي الْمَاءِ
titles.en: Chapter 91 – The one in Ihraam cannot immerse himself into the water

titles.ar: بَابُ أَنَّ الْمُحْرِمَ لَا يَرْتَمِسُ فِي الْمَاءِ
titles.en: Chapter 91 – The one in Ihraam cannot immerse himself into the water

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنْ حَمَّادِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنْ حَرِيزٍ عَمَّنْ أَخْبَرَهُ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ لَا يَرْتَمِسُ الْمُحْرِمُ فِي الْمَاءِ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Hammad Bin Isa, from Hareyz, from the one who informed him, (It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullahasws having said: ‘The one in Ihraam cannot immerse himself into the water’.

verses.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ الْحُسَيْنِ عَنْ صَفْوَانَ عَنْ يَعْقُوبَ بْنِ شُعَيْبٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ لَا يَرْتَمِسُ الْمُحْرِمُ فِي الْمَاءِ وَ لَا الصَّائِمُ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Muhammad Bin Al Husayn, from Safwan, from Yaqoub Bin Shuayb, (It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullahasws having said: ‘Neither the one in Ihraam nor the Fasting one can immerse himself into the water’.
